name: Polymorph (CristelleSinnett)
description:
Jeu : Polymorph

Équipe: Nefarious

Membres :
Cristelle Sinnett
Myriam Boisvenue St-Jean
Maude Roussin
Félix Leblanc
Maxime Jacquet

Finding the right portal to go back home isn’t as easy as it may seem, and the way can be treacherous for anyone who is lost. Thankfully, in Space, someone can be more than one.

Try to overcome the different puzzles by transforming yourself and discovering all that you can do. Sometimes, it can be useful to be a polymorph creature.
